first_para: Molly Irene Samuel-Leport MBE (born 12 September 1961, London, England) is a British karateka. She has a 4th Dan black belt in karate and is the winner of multiple European Karate Championships. Molly has also received 1989 Sunday Times International Sports Woman of the Year, 1987 Jamaican Jubliee Award for Excellence.

full.extract:
Molly Irene Samuel-Leport MBE (born 12 September 1961, London, England) is a British karateka. She has a 4th Dan black belt in karate and is the winner of multiple European Karate Championships. Molly has also received 1989 Sunday Times International Sports Woman of the Year, 1987 Jamaican Jubliee Award for Excellence.
Samuel-Leport is the Conservative Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Walthamstow in the 2015 general election. She was previously an unsuccessful candidate in the Leytonstone ward of Waltham Forest council at the 2014 election.
She was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in the 2015 New Year Honours for services to karate.
full.title: Molly Samuels
